answers.answer: Hi there,From your symptoms it seems you are suffering from a  fungal infection or candidiasis.It is best to avoid using  any perfumed soaps, bubble baths and toiletries, change underwear daily, wash underwear in hot water (to destroy fungi) and double rinse (to remove any irritating detergent) and take adequate nutrition and sleep. It would be advisable to have it evaluated by a specialist for proper evaluation and management. A complete physical examination is needed to reach a clinical evaluation.  Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.
